author: KristofWillen

changelog.release_notes:
Version 4.3 :
- Better images for Brussels and Kiev
- Added city of Dresden

Version 4.2 :
- Small improvement on batterybar length

Version 4.0 :
- Improved fonts
- Added battery bar
- Enhanced images of Brussels, Athens & Pisa
- Added Dubai skyline
- Better Washington image
- Added Easter egg
- Fixed some missing destroy_layer in deinit()

Version 3.6 :
- Fixes an issue where Random mode doesn't get reactivated when switching settings

Version 3.5 :
- Added skylines of Kyoto, Cairo, Athens, Pisa, Delhi, Budapest & Washington
- Better image for Brussels

Version 3.4 :
- Change skyline every odd hours in random mode to avoid interference with Night mode
- Added Dallas skyline

Version 3.3 :
- Added skylines of Berlin, Dublin & Shangai

Version 3.2:
- Improved randomness
- Set random behaviour as default
- Added skyline of Singapore
- Better Tokyo skyline

Version 3.1 :
- size optimization of all images
- Added Chicago, Seattle and Moscow
- Better skylines for Istanbul, Boston & Barcelona

Version 3.0 :
- Added randomizer option.  If enabled, the skyline will change randomly every 2 hours
- Added city skylines of Rome, Istanbul, Barcelona, Kiev and Saint Louis
- Fixed space issue in city names
- Fixed Night mode issue

Version 2.0 :
- Added 'night mode' : watch face inverts between 8pm and 6am.

Version 1.2 :
- Fixes an app crash when using San Francisco background

Version 1.1 :
- Improved Paris image
- Added Tokyo, Boston and San Francisco
- some slight code improvements

description:
This watchface will take you on a trip around the world ! Just use the default random mode to find a new city skyline displayed on your wrist every two hours.  Or choose a fixed skyline, while more are added on a regular base.  Now featuring a 'Night mode' in which the watchface inverts and shows a starry sky during night time.  

Also includes a date and battery indicator.

latest_release.release_notes:
Version 4.3 :

- Added city of Dresden

title: Skylines
